20110127171729.000|20110127171730.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
20110127171729.000|20110127171730.000|CC1|WOMAN" DEALING WITH HAIR LOSS.  
20110127171730.000|20110127171732.000|CC1|DID YOU KNOW WOMEN CAN LOSE UP  
20110127171732.000|20110127171734.000|CC1|TO 150 HAIRS A DAY AND IT       
20110127171734.000|20110127171737.000|CC1|USUALLY GROWS BACK, BUT WHAT DO 
20110127171737.000|20110127171739.000|CC1|YOU DO WHEN IT STOPS GROWING?   
20110127171739.000|20110127171740.000|CC1|DR. PETERSON, GOOD MORNING.     
20110127171740.000|20110127171741.000|CC1|>> GOOD MORNING.                
20110127171741.000|20110127171743.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A BIG PROBLEM FOR,   
20110127171743.000|20110127171744.000|CC1|LIKE, 20 MILLION WOMEN WHO      
20110127171744.000|20110127171745.000|CC1|SUFFER FROM HAIR LOSS.          
20110127171745.000|20110127171747.000|CC1|WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN   
20110127171747.000|20110127171749.000|CC1|HAIR LOSS AND HAIR THINNING?    
20110127171749.000|20110127171750.000|CC1|>> THEY ARE GENERALLY THE SAME  
20110127171750.000|20110127171751.000|CC1|THING ACTUALLY WHICH IS WHEN YOU
20110127171751.000|20110127171754.000|CC1|LOSE A HAIR, A NEW HAIR DOESN'T 
20110127171754.000|20110127171754.000|CC1|REPLACE IT.                     
20110127171754.000|20110127171757.000|CC1|THIS IS IN CONTRAST TO WHETHER  
20110127171757.000|20110127171758.000|CC1|THE STRANDS ACTUALLY GET THINNER
20110127171758.000|20110127171759.000|CC1|WHICH DOES HAPPEN IN ONE        
20110127171759.000|20110127171802.000|CC1|CONDITION, BUT THE MAJORITY OF  
20110127171802.000|20110127171803.000|CC1|THE TIME IT FALLS OUT.          
20110127171803.000|20110127171804.000|CC1|>> FOR MOST WOMEN THOUGH THE    
20110127171804.000|20110127171805.000|CC1|HAIR WILL FALL BACK.            
20110127171805.000|20110127171807.000|CC1|HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE TO GROW   
20110127171807.000|20110127171809.000|CC1|BACK?                           
20110127171809.000|20110127171810.000|CC1|>> HAIR GROWS IN CYCLES.        
20110127171810.000|20110127171813.000|CC1|THE HAIRS GROW FOR TWO TO SIX   
20110127171813.000|20110127171814.000|CC1|YEARS AND THEN GO INTO A RESTING
20110127171814.000|20110127171816.000|CC1|PHASE FOR ABOUT SIX WEEKS WHERE 
20110127171816.000|20110127171818.000|CC1|THEY STOP GROWING.              
20110127171818.000|20110127171819.000|CC1|THEN THEY FALL OUT, AND A NEW   
20110127171819.000|20110127171821.000|CC1|HAIR TAKES ITS PLACE RIGHT AWAY.
20110127171821.000|20110127171823.000|CC1|>> LET'S TALK ABOUT DIFFERENT   
20110127171823.000|20110127171824.000|CC1|THINGS THAT COULD CAUSE SOME OF 
20110127171824.000|20110127171825.000|CC1|THE HAIR LOSS.                  
20110127171825.000|20110127171828.000|CC1|THE FIRST IS IRON DEFICIENCY.   
20110127171828.000|20110127171830.000|CC1|HOW DOES THAT LEAD TO HAIR LOSS?
20110127171830.000|20110127171833.000|CC1|>> WE TYPICALLY ASSOCIATE IRON  
20110127171833.000|20110127171834.000|CC1|DEFICIENCY WITH ANEMIA BUT IT   
20110127171834.000|20110127171836.000|CC1|CAN CAUSE HAIR LOSS BECAUSE IRON
20110127171836.000|20110127171838.000|CC1|IS NEEDED TO CREATE NEW HAIR.   
20110127171838.000|20110127171840.000|CC1|IT IS EASILY DIAGNOSED WITH A   
20110127171840.000|20110127171841.000|CC1|BLOOD TEST.                     
20110127171841.000|20110127171842.000|CC1|ONCE YOU SUPPLEMENT WITH IRON   
20110127171842.000|20110127171843.000|CC1|THE HAIR GROWS BACK.            
20110127171843.000|20110127171844.000|CC1|>> COMPLETELY TREATABLE.        
20110127171844.000|20110127171846.000|CC1|NO PROBLEMS THERE.              
20110127171846.000|20110127171851.000|CC1|ANOTHER ONE THAT'S REVERSIBLE IS
20110127171851.000|20110127171852.000|CC1|HYPOTHYROIDISM.                 
20110127171852.000|20110127171853.000|CC1|WHAT IS THAT?                   
20110127171853.000|20110127171854.000|CC1|.                               
20110127171854.000|20110127171855.000|CC1|>> YOUR BODY IS NOT CREATING    
20110127171855.000|20110127171856.000|CC1|ENOUGH HORMONES.                
20110127171856.000|20110127171859.000|CC1|IT CAN CAUSE WEIGHT GAIN,       
20110127171859.000|20110127171900.000|CC1|FATIGUE.                        
20110127171900.000|20110127171901.000|CC1|>> BESIDES HAIR LOSS.           
20110127171901.000|20110127171901.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20110127171901.000|20110127171903.000|CC1|IT'S DIAGNOSED WITH A BLOOD TEST
20110127171903.000|20110127171908.000|CC1|AND REVERSIBLE IF TREATED WITH  
20110127171908.000|20110127171908.000|CC1|HIGH                            
20110127171908.000|20110127171909.000|CC1|THYROID HORMONES.               
20110127171909.000|20110127171911.000|CC1|>> YOUR HAIR GROWS BACK?        
20110127171911.000|20110127171912.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110127171912.000|20110127171913.000|CC1|>> ANOTHER THING IS YOU SAY     
20110127171913.000|20110127171914.000|CC1|SOMETIMES HAIR LOSS CAN BE A    
20110127171914.000|20110127171916.000|CC1|SIDE EFFECT OF MEDICATIONS.     
20110127171916.000|20110127171917.000|CC1|WHAT KINDS OF MEDICATIONS CAN   
20110127171917.000|20110127171918.000|CC1|TRIGGER LOSS OF HAIR?           
20110127171918.000|20110127171920.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF MEDICATIONS THAT ARE
20110127171920.000|20110127171921.000|CC1|USED TO TREAT COMMON CONDITIONS.
20110127171921.000|20110127171923.000|CC1|SO GOUT, ARTHRITIS, HIGH BLOOD  
20110127171923.000|20110127171923.000|CC1|PRESSURE.                       
20110127171923.000|20110127171925.000|CC1|THERE IS A SLEW OF THEM.        
20110127171925.000|20110127171928.000|CC1|IT MAY DISRUPT THE GROWTH CYCLE 
20110127171928.000|20110127171930.000|CC1|SUCH THAT THE HAIR FALLS OUT    
20110127171930.000|20110127171930.000|CC1|MORE QUICKLY.                   
20110127171930.000|20110127171935.000|CC1|IF YOU STOP THE MEDICINE, IT    
20110127171935.000|20110127171936.000|CC1|GROWS BACK.                     
20110127171936.000|20110127171937.000|CC1|REVER                           
20110127171937.000|20110127171937.000|CC1|REVERSIBLE.                     
20110127171937.000|20110127171938.000|CC1|>> WOMEN WHO HAVE BEEN PREGNANT 
20110127171938.000|20110127171940.000|CC1|KNOW YOUR HAIR IS BEAUTIFUL BUT 
20110127171940.000|20110127171942.000|CC1|THEN YOU HAVE THE BABY AND YOUR 
20110127171942.000|20110127171943.000|CC1|HAIR IS FALLING OUT.            
20110127171943.000|20110127171944.000|CC1|WHAT'S HAPPENING THERE?         
20110127171944.000|20110127171950.000|CC1|>> THAT IS CALLED TIL           
20110127171950.000|20110127171953.000|CC1|TILAGEN EFLUVIUM.               
20110127171953.000|20110127171956.000|CC1|THE HAIR GROWTH CYCLE IS        
20110127171956.000|20110127171957.000|CC1|DISRUPTED SO HAIRS IN THE       
20110127171957.000|20110127172000.000|CC1|GROWING STAGE RAPIDLY SHIFT INTO
20110127172000.000|20110127172001.000|CC1|RESTING AND SHED.               
20110127172001.000|20110127172003.000|CC1|OTHER EVENTS THAT TRIGGER THIS  
20110127172003.000|20110127172006.000|CC1|ARE EXTREME STRESS, SEVERE      
20110127172006.000|20110127172008.000|CC1|INFECTION AND MALNUTRITION.     
20110127172008.000|20110127172009.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT PERMANENT.          
20110127172009.000|20110127172011.000|CC1|BASICALLY THE HAIR GROWS BACK   
20110127172011.000|20110127172013.000|CC1|WITHIN SIX WEEKS TO THREE MONTHS
20110127172013.000|20110127172015.000|CC1|AFTER THE EVENT.                
20110127172015.000|20110127172016.000|CC1|>> SO YOU JUST HAVE TO DEAL WIT 
20110127172016.000|20110127172018.000|CC1|DURING THAT TIME.               
20110127172018.000|20110127172020.000|CC1|OFTEN TIMES IF YOU ARE USING TOO
20110127172020.000|20110127172022.000|CC1|MANY CHEMICAL PRODUCTS OR       
20110127172022.000|20110127172024.000|CC1|TREATMENTS, DYING YOUR HAIR, THE
20110127172024.000|20110127172026.000|CC1|OVERCOLORING, PROCESSING, THAT  
20110127172026.000|20110127172027.000|CC1|CAN DAMAGE THE HAIR AND LEAD TO 
20110127172027.000|20110127172028.000|CC1|HAIR LOSS, TOO.                 
20110127172028.000|20110127172030.000|CC1|>> ALL THE CHEMICALS CAN DAMAGE 
20110127172030.000|20110127172032.000|CC1|THE HAIR AND CAUSE IT TO BREAK. 
20110127172032.000|20110127172035.000|CC1|IT JUST BREAKS OFF JUST BEFORE  
20110127172035.000|20110127172037.000|CC1|THE ROOT SO IF YOU STOP USING   
20110127172037.000|20110127172038.000|CC1|THESE CHEMICALS THE NEW HAIR    
20110127172038.000|20110127172041.000|CC1|COMES RIGHT IN.                 
20110127172041.000|20110127172045.000|CC1|>> THERE IS THE ALOPECIA.       
20110127172045.000|20110127172045.000|CC1|WHAT IS THAT?                   
20110127172045.000|20110127172048.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF POPULAR HAIR STYLES.
20110127172048.000|20110127172051.000|CC1|YOU ARE PUTTING TENSION FROM    
20110127172051.000|20110127172053.000|CC1|WEARING YOUR HAIR BACK TIGHTLY. 
20110127172053.000|20110127172056.000|CC1|IF YOU HAVE A TIGHT PONYTAIL OR 
20110127172056.000|20110127172058.000|CC1|A WEAVE THAT'S WEAVED INTO CORN 
20110127172058.000|20110127172101.000|CC1|ROWS OR BRAIDS THE FOLLICLE CAN 
20110127172101.000|20110127172104.000|CC1|BE DAMAGED AND THE HAIR CAN FALL
20110127172104.000|20110127172104.000|CC1|OUT.                            
20110127172104.000|20110127172107.000|CC1|THIS CAN BE PERMANENT.          
20110127172107.000|20110127172111.000|CC1|>> THEN THERE IS ANDR           
20110127172111.000|20110127172113.000|CC1|ANDROGENI ALOPECIA.             
20110127172113.000|20110127172114.000|CC1|HOW COMMON IS THAT?             
20110127172114.000|20110127172119.000|CC1|>> IN PREMENOPAUSE WOMEN 13% OF 
20110127172119.000|20110127172121.000|CC1|THE POPULATION HAS THIS.        
20110127172121.000|20110127172124.000|CC1|AFTER MENOPAUSE 75% OF WOMEN CAN
20110127172124.000|20110127172125.000|CC1|DEVELOP THIS.                   
20110127172125.000|20110127172127.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS IS THE HAIR        
20110127172127.000|20110127172128.000|CC1|FOLLICLES ARE SENSITIVE TO THE  
20110127172128.000|20110127172129.000|CC1|MALE HORMONES IN OUR BODY.      
20110127172129.000|20110127172131.000|CC1|AS WOMEN WE ALL HAVE MALE       
20110127172131.000|20110127172133.000|CC1|HORMONES IN THE BODY.           
20110127172133.000|20110127172136.000|CC1|THEY ARE CALLED ANDROGENS.      
20110127172136.000|20110127172138.000|CC1|THEY STIMULATE THE FOLLICLE TO  
20110127172138.000|20110127172139.000|CC1|CREATE LESS HAIR AND THE HAIR   
20110127172139.000|20110127172141.000|CC1|BECOMES FINER.                  
20110127172141.000|20110127172142.000|CC1|SO THERE IS LOSS OF THICKNESS
